amendment.description: An amendment numbered 102 printed in Part B of House Report 118-272 to prohibit funding for vaccine mandates.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Greene (GA) amendment (A045) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Greene (GA) amendment (A045) Agreed to by voice vote.
